text:
Clinical Psychopharmacology found that the combination of olanzapine (an

atypical antipsychotic) and THC resulted in improved symptoms of

schizophrenia (4).

Another study published in the Journal of Cannabis Research found that the

use of cannabidiol (CBD), a non-psychoactive compound found in cannabis, in

combination with antipsychotics resulted in reduced symptoms of anxiety and

depression (5).

Mechanisms of Action The mechanisms by which antipsychotics interact
